title: Keeping time
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Television broadcasting - Social aspects
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Mothers and daughters
description: Integrates documentary footage and dramatised sequences in dealing with mother and daughter relationships. Particular reference is given to the influence of television on the family structure and shows how the mothers want their daughters to better themselves through the local dance studio.
